text: Bottom line: U.S. acted decisively and appropriately in the face of the Assad regime's cowardice. Bottom line: this nation leads.
Forces took extraordinary measures to avoid casualties to civilians and casualties to airfield personnel.
Russia was notified before the strikes, and precautions were taken to protect U.S. forces against any retaliatory attacks.
The strike was intended to keep the Assad regime from EVER using chemical weapons again.
Strike last night was proportional, given Assad's heinous acts against innocent civilians early this week.
Just received a classified briefing on the situation in Syria from Chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff Gen. Joe Dunford.
